ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: Even if they made it so a groups combined damage was taken into consideration solo wizards would still get the kill credit.  They can do so much damage per
ygData.messageBody:
Even if they made it so a groups combined damage was taken into
consideration solo wizards would still get the kill credit. They can do
so much damage per spell that there really isn't enough HP left on a mob
for a group total to be more.
Verants choice of whoever does the most damage vs. group damage, makes
no difference.


Mr. J Daniels




>
> The whole killstealing thing is due to a very, very bad design decision by
> Verant. I.e., that a group's total damage is ignored in assigning credit for
> kills, and if an outside player has done more damage than any *single* group
> member, then he gets credit for the kill. Brad posted a note about this
